palette.highload no-highload: Calling no-highload function from highload function

palette.ssr has-db-access: Calling function working with the database in the server side rendering function

palette.api has-curl: Calling curl function from API functions

palette.api2 has-curl: Calling curl function from API2 functions

palette.message-internals: Calling function marked as internal outside of functions with the color message-module
